wordGroup: biomedical engineering 生物医学工程学，生物医学工程
biomedical science 生物医学；生物医学科学；生物科学系

sentences.en: Biomedical research will enable many individuals infected with HIV to live longer, more comfortable lives.
sentences.cn: 生物医学研究将使许多感染艾滋病病毒的人们能够活得时间更长、更舒适。

sentences.en: To biomedical researchers all over the world, twins offer a precious opportunity to untangle the influence of genes and the environment—of nature and nurture.
sentences.cn: 对世界各地的生物医学研究人员来说，双胞胎提供了一个宝贵的机会，来解开基因和环境——也就是先天和后天的影响之谜。

sentences.en: But he noted that biomedical journals such as Annals of Internal Medicine, the Journal of the American Medical Association and The Lancet pay strong attention to statistical review.
sentences.cn: 但他指出，《内科医学年鉴》、《美国医学会杂志》和《柳叶刀》等生物医学期刊非常重视统计评论。
